definitions.definition: A garment knitted from wool , worn over the upper body.
A shirt worn by a member of an athletic team , usually oversized, typically depicting the athlete's name and team number as well as the team's logotype.
examples: A young boy was wearing a Manchester City Erling Haaland jersey .

main_definition: ( countable ) A garment knitted from wool , worn over the upper body.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , US ) A shirt worn by a member of an athletic team , usually oversized, typically depicting the athlete's name and team number as well as the team's logotype.
( uncountable ) A type of fabric knit .
